description:
Can't add items or anything... Basically it opens but doesn't do anything. There's no documentation... help -> Renku handbook is a 404 on the KDE documentation website. Zanshin/Renku site has no set-up instructions or info on how to use the app. 

Wanted to use this, but for an app that is supposed to help you, it a big waste of time trying to troubleshoot. Save your time just install cherrytree instead.
summary: No documentation, doesn't seem to do anything

description: Le hace falta un archivo para iniciarse bien y si no lo tienes, el programa no correra.
